songs.title: Remind Me
songs.lyrics:
[Brad] [Verse 1]
We didn't care if people stared
We'd make out in a crowd somewhere
Somebody'd tell us to get a room
It's hard to believe that was me and you
Now we keep saying that we're okay
But I don't want to settle for good not great
I miss the way that it felt back then I want to feel that way again

[Verse 2]
[Brad] Been so long that you'd forget
The way I used to kiss your neck
[Carrie] Remind me, remind me
[Brad] So on fire so in love
Way back when we couldn't get enough
[Carrie] Remind me, remind me

[Carrie] [Verse 3]
Remember the airport dropping me off
We were kissing goodbye and we couldn't stop
[Brad] I felt bad because you missed your flight
[Carrie and Brad] But that meant we had one more night

[Carrie] [Verse 4]
Do you remember how it used to be
We'd turn out the lights and we didn't just sleep
[Brad] Remind me, baby, remind me
[Carrie]
Oh, so on fire so in love
That look in your eyes that I miss so much
[Brad] Remind me, baby, remind me

[Verse 5]
[Brad] I want to feel that way
[Carrie] Yeah, I want to hold you close
[Brad and Carrie]
Oh, if you still love me
Don't just assume I know

[Carrie] Baby, remind me, remind me

[Verse 6]
[Carrie] Do you remember the way it felt?
[Brad] You mean back when we couldn't control ourselves
[Carrie] Remind me
[Brad] Yeah, remind me
[Carrie]
All those things that you used to do
That made me fall in love with you
Remind me, oh, baby, remind me

[Brad] [Verse 7]
Yeah, you'd waked up in my old T-shirt
All those mornings I was late for work
Remind me

[Brad and Carrie] Oh, baby, remind me

[Outro]
[Carrie] Oh, baby, remind me, baby, remind me
[Brad] Yeah, you'd waked up in my old T-shirt
[Carrie] Remind me, yeah, oh
[Brad] Baby, remind me
